CustomField.description: The number of seconds of talk time incurred on calls received by the organisation from the outside world, regardless of whether they have been connected or not to a User. No Natterbox User will ever be associated with this call statistic, as purely measures inbound traffic.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: "How many seconds have callers calling into my organisation been spending talking to a real person"
CustomField.label: Inbound Talk Seconds
